00023 #include "ys_build.h" // compile time settings
00024 #include <vector>
00025 #include <string>

00027 using namespace std;
00028 
00029 class YardDatabase;
00030 
00043 class YardCarrierType: public XMLNode
00044 {
00045  public:
00046    
00047     friend class YardDatabase;
00048   
00049     YardCarrierType() { setName("Carrier_Table"); }     
00050     YardCarrierType(const string& xml):XMLNode(xml, XMLNode::Str) {}
00051         
00052     ~YardCarrierType();
00053         
00054     static const char * GetUnique() { return "CRR_Name"; }
00055     
00056     /* gettors */
00057 
00059     string GetIdS() const 
00060         { return child("CRR_ID").data(); }
00061     long GetId() const 
00062         { return ToLong(GetIdS()); }
00064     string GetName() const 
00065         { return child("CRR_Name").data(); }
00067     string GetPickupLoc() const 
00068         { return child("CRR_Pickup_Location").data(); }
00070     string GetPhone() const 
00071         { return child("CRR_Phone_Number").data(); }
00072 
00073     /* settors */
00075     void SetName(const string& str) 
00076         { child("CRR_Name").setData(str); }
00078     void SetPickupLoc(const string& str) 
00079         { child("CRR_Pickup_Location").setData(str); }
00081     void SetPhone(const string& str) 
00082         { child("CRR_Phone_Number").setData(str); }
00083 
00090     virtual string ToString(const string& delim=",", bool quotes = true) const;
00091 };
